content: That sounds like an interesting and thought-provoking story that could raise some important themes and questions about the role of technology in society, the value of art, and the importance of hope in difficult times. The idea of a society that has lost its ability to appreciate music and is now relying on machines to produce it, only to realize the true value of music through the protagonist's journey, is a compelling one. The idea of the protagonist being a girl who cross-dresses as a boy could add an interesting layer to the story, as it could reflect her sense of not fitting in and wanting to be something different. It could also add a layer of complexity to the relationship between the protagonist and the innovator. The story could also explore the idea of music being weaponized in war and the consequences of that. It sounds like an emotionally impactful story with a good balance of hope and realism.
